breadth.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the distance from one side of something to the other
breadth.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The boat measured 15 feet in length and 4 feet in breadth.
breadth.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the quality of including a lot of different people, things, or ideas
